data.benefits: Scheme provides reimbursement of the expenses incurred towards the credit rating to the extent of 75% or maximum of Rs 2 lakhs.
data.eligibility: All exsiting industrial units in commercial and regular production are eligible to apply under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The unit must file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) on the portal. 
  2. The item of manufacture should not be in the restrictive list set by the State Government. 
  3. The unit must obtain No objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable. 
  4. The unit should be in commercial production. 
  5. The unit must be in regular production when the assistance is disbursed; assistance will not be provided to closed units.
data.beneficiaries: All exsiting industrial units in commercial and regular production are eligible to apply under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The unit must file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) on the portal. 
  2. The item of manufacture should not be in the restrictive list set by the State Government. 
  3. The unit must obtain No objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable. 
  4. The unit should be in commercial production. 
  5. The unit must be in regular production when the assistance is disbursed; assistance will not be provided to closed units.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: Rating scheme would encourage MSME sector in improvising its contribution to the economy by way of increasing its productivity since a good rating would enhance their acceptability in the market.
data.objective: To make access to credit quicker and cheaper and thus help in economizing the cost of credit.
data.description: Scheme provides reimbursement of the expenses incurred towards the credit rating to the extent of 75% or maximum of Rs 2 lakhs.
data.how_to_apply: Application in prescribed Form for the grant of Credit Rating Assistance along with listed documents would be submitted to theDirector/ Director General, Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises, through the web portal of the department.
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the approval from the concerned auhtority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf 

Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828
Email-id deepakbura.etd@hry.gov.in
data.beneficiary: All Industry - All Entities - Haryana - All MSMEs
